EmailTemplate.description: Internal notification to case owner when case is assigned. This is a copy of the original now in the Partner Global Templates folder for Partner and Internal User access, kept this here where It was originally before I locked down access to this folder. TDM
EmailTemplate.name: SUPPORT: New assignment notification (F1 Case)
EmailTemplate.subject: Case # {!Case.CaseNumber}: {!Case.Subject} has been assigned to you.
